basics.name: Shaked Lokits
basics.label: Boldly going where engineering shouldn't
basics.summary:
Armed with a triple-major for Computer Science, Education and Visual Communication at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem and Bezalel Academy for Arts and Design. I am very interested in utilizing interdisciplinary solutions to solve and re-design real world problems.
Coming from a difficult social-economic background I quit school early and found great interest in the symbiosis between design and engineering for it’s impact on re-designing our education. Constantly looking for better information models which could be applied to parametric and generative design solutions.
When I’m not obsessing about content generation, you would usually find me sailing somewhere, motorcycling a mountain or wondering around looking for something new to eat.

education.institution: Bezalel Academy of Art and Design

work.name: Stealth Startup
highlights: Led the development of Spark, a mobile app designed to gamify the mobilization of NGO activists, enhancing engagement and distribution of public affairs content.
Directed cross-disciplinary teams in creating interactive and user-friendly app features that incentives community growth and active participation.
Collaborated with NGOs to understand their needs, ensuring the platform effectively supports their initiatives and maximizes community impact.
Piloted user feedback loops to refine app functionalities, ensuring alignment with user expectations and campaign effectiveness.

work.name: Words of Iron
highlights: Founded Words of Iron, a pioneering project in collaboration with Israel's National Public Diplomacy Directorate and leading tech companies, in response to the October 7th Hamas attack and the onset of the Hamas-Israel War.
Established the mission to address online hate-speech by empowering individuals to deliver factual information to key audiences.

Led Words of Iron to growth exceeding 1M monthly active users, generating millions of daily impressions and playing a crucial role in shaping public opinion and countering hate-speech in the digital realm.

work.name: Alta
highlights: Developed and launched an AI-powered revenue platform, enhancing data-driven decision-making for sales, marketing, and customer success teams.

Coordinated cross-functional efforts to integrate major CRM and data tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Stripe, significantly improving real-time data collection, metric tracking and insight analysis.
Developed and researched the design of a customizable metrics library, establishing industry best practices and facilitating scalable, insights-driven business growth.

work.name: Melio
highlights: Developed and managed various products using serverless architecture on AWS
Led the design of vendor management solutions and remodeling of vendor systems
Developed international payments, Mastercard directory, Shopify Bill-Pay, QuickBooks Sync and AR
Actively mentored other engineers in career development and fostering a culture of teamwork and collaboration

work.name: Datahack
work.description: Datahack is an Israeli non-profit dedicated to the advancement of data science and machine learning in Israel. We focus on strengthening academia-industry ties, data science literacy and education, intra-community cohesion and knowledge sharing and empowerment of underrepresented populations.
highlights: Managed the engineering team of Datahack
Developed event management systems, data pipelines, and data visualization tools

work.name: WeWork
highlights: Developed an enterprise grade, high-load, zero-loss financial systems over RabbitMQ, Kubernetes, Go, Rails, Node and React
Created and deployed a production monitoring, logging and tracing infrastructure

work.name: Architectural Association School
highlights: Taught and advised multiple master’s final projects in the field of Generative Design.
Researched and designed maritime fishing infrastructure for the ministry of fisheries.

work.name: Lightricks
highlights: Researched and developed a production-level, style transfer feature which imitates real-life craft processes
Automated a visual quality, testing and verification system
Designed the first multi-network AI-powered photo editing solution in the market

work.name: RealFriend
highlights: Developed live production AI CRM and an expert-hybrid AI conversational agents without LLMs
Trained and managed CRF models for free-form data extraction and chat comprehension

work.name: Swedish Ministry of Education and Research
highlights: Consulted on the design of a generative, high-scale web application built for parents

work.name: Red Hat

Worked with popular CI and virtualization tools such as: Jenkins, Docker, Ansible, Puppet, OpenShift, OpenStack and more

work.name: The Hebrew University of Jerusalem
highlights: Developing pedagogical programs for the Youth Center for Advanced Studies (YCAS) in the areas of computer science and engineering
Curated a special cyber/cryptography program for the Ministry of Education
Worked as a TA of Academic Literature

work.name: The Israeli Ministry of Education
highlights: Instructed calculus and graphic design across multiple high schools, notably leading the first-ever ultra-orthodox high school class to achieve a Bagrut certificate in mathematics.
Developed the innovative bricolage education paradigm through experimentation with diverse teaching methods beyond traditional approaches.
Created and implemented several pedagogical programs in mathematics, computer science, and parametric design based on the bricolage education paradigm.

work.name: Jam Media
highlights: Coordinated large-scale digital advertising projects with public institutions, political parties and universities
Developed client protocols and optimized working technologies and design workflows

work.name: McCann Worldgroup
highlights: Specializing in big-industry and political print advertising
Managed and coordinated large-scale branding & advertising projects
Developed complex mass-production print processes and developed several work protocols

work.name: Lapam Israel's Government Advertising Agency
highlights: Designed multiple mass-media public affairs campaigns for the Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Health, and the Ministry of Transportation
Mentored a student in the Moshal Program for a year.
Provided guidance and support in their professional development, including networking, resume building, and interview preparation.
Founded the Public Diplomacy Project, an organization numbers over 7000 members, dedicated to combating online hate speech
Developed Words of Iron, a pioneering project with 1M MAU's that aims to address online hate-speech by empowering individuals to deliver factual information to key audiences
Led the development of Spark, a mobile app designed to gamify the mobilization of NGO activists

Mentored participants in tackling real-world HealthTech challenges, guiding them from ideation to implementation

We focus on strengthening academia-industry ties, data science literacy and education, intra-community cohesion and knowledge sharing and empowerment of underrepresented populations.
highlights: Managed the engineering team of Datahack.

volunteer.description: The Side Project Club is a weekly meetup at the Facebook offices in Tel Aviv. We meet to discuss and brainstorm ideas for side-projects, share knowledge, and collaborate on projects.
highlights: Mentored members in various side-projects, including a data science project, a web development project, and a mobile app project
Provided guidance and support to members in selecting projects, setting goals, and overcoming challenges
Collaborated with members to develop their portfolios and showcase their projects on LinkedIn

volunteer.organization: Bezalel Academy of Art and Design
highlights: Mentored students and aided in the development of multiple final projects.
Projects included interactive installations, game design, print design, digital art, web design and more.
Designed multiple mass-media public affairs campaigns
Managed the digital marketing team of the 2011 Israeli Social Justice Movement
Drew half a million people to the streets of Tel Aviv

Directed cross-disciplinary teams in creating interactive and user-friendly app features that incentives community growth and active participation.
Collaborated with NGOs to understand their needs, ensuring the platform effectively supports their initiatives and maximizes community impact.
Piloted user feedback loops to refine app functionalities, ensuring alignment with user expectations and campaign effectiveness.

projects.name: Words of Iron
highlights: Developed Words of Iron, a pioneering project with 1M MAU's that aims to address online hate-speech by empowering individuals to deliver factual information to key audiences

projects.name: Shopify Bill Pay
projects.description: Comprehensive bill payment solution integrated into the Shopify admin, allowing merchants to easily schedule, pay, and manage business bills.
highlights: Served as Technical Lead for the development and implementation of Shopify's Bill Pay feature
Engineered a system that supports multiple payment methods, including Shopify Balance, bank transfers, and credit cards
Implemented integrations with QuickBooks® Online, Xero and risk evaluation models for seamless bill management and synchronization

projects.name: Melio Network
projects.description: Comprehensive vendor data management and payment system, streamlining bill payments for businesses while allowing vendors to manage their payment details across multiple payers.
highlights: Managed and developed a system merging, validating, and managing vendor data for efficient bill payments
Successfully remodeled the database without disrupting operations for 400 engineers and millions of customers
Developed efficient vendor matching algorithms, product flows, and fraud detection machine learning models
Integrated major systems including MasterCard's Billers, Apple Card vendors, and Quickbooks Vendors
Led a team of 4 as tech lead and project manager, completing the 6-month project on schedule

projects.name: International Payments
projects.description: Streamlined international payments system, allowing customers to perform overseas payments without complex forms.
highlights: Managed and developed a user-friendly international payments system, simplifying cross-border transactions
Collaborated with product managers to gather technical requirements, ensuring compliance with international trade agreements
Developed both serverless payment infrastructure and web product for seamless integration
Became the company's primary knowledge source on international payments requirements and issues
Coordinated cross-functional across four engineering departments, including product, design, and operations

projects.name: Luke
projects.description: Innovative AI-powered real estate chatbot named Luke, capable of assisting thousands of users simultaneously in their property search and purchase process.
highlights: Developed live production AI CRM and front-facing experiences using a fully integrated Next.js, Apollo, MongoDB, and GraphQL stack
Trained and managed CRF models for free-form data extraction and chat comprehension
Developed expert-hybrid AI conversational agents without relying on large language models (LLMs)
Created an AI system capable of handling complex real estate queries, including property details, neighborhood information, and financial requirements
Implemented features allowing Luke to interact with 40,000+ users, resulting in 1,000+ signed leases
Designed Luke to provide personalized property recommendations based on user preferences and requirements

projects.name: Intelligent School Selection
projects.entity: Swedish Ministry of Education and Research
projects.description: Generative, interactive, high-scale web application to address educational stratification and inequality in Stockholm.
highlights: Consulted on the design, architecture, and implementation of a generative, interactive, high-scale web application to address educational stratification and inequality in Stockholm.
Designed a predictive model to forecast student achievements based on historical records and school performance data
Contributed to significant improvements in overall student achievements in Stockholm over a 4-year period
Utilized big data analysis and machine learning techniques to provide personalized school recommendations

projects.name: Fishing Infrastructure Optimization
projects.entity: Ministry of Agriculture, Fisheries and Food (MAFF)
highlights: Led a comprehensive study and infrastructure planning project to support small fishing businesses in south England, resulting in enacted legislation for long-term development.
Analyzed 100 years of historical data on fishing quotas, trade, and transportation to address unfair competition from large fishing conglomerates
Developed procedural generation algorithms to create ideal infrastructural planning for small fishing businesses
Designed a 50-year Tax Code plan, including government subsidies, to incentive long-term land development for fishing infrastructure
Managed the project from research phase through to legal proposal, including drawing technical and legal requirements
Created plans for strategic development of Docks, Weighing Stations, Half-way Logistical Hubs, and Transportation centers
Contributed to the write-up of the legal proposal, which was successfully enacted into law in 2019

projects.name: Organic Style Transfer
projects.description: Innovative AI-powered image style transfer feature for Photoleap, enabling users to apply artistic styles and color grading to photos with ease by following organic craft processes.
highlights: Researched, managed, and developed a production-level, separable style transfer feature that imitates real-life craft processes
Orchestrated an automated, visual quality testing and verification system to ensure consistent results
Designed the first multi-network AI-powered photo editing solution in the market
Implemented color grading capabilities to streamline editing workflows for professionals and content creators
Developed features for batch processing, allowing users to apply consistent styles across multiple images efficiently
Created a system that supports both preset styles and user-uploaded reference images for maximum flexibility
Developed a neural network engine to run on legacy iPhone CPUs

projects.name: Welcome to Stanistan
projects.description: Award-winning PC game that satirizes social media management and tourism promotion for a fictional struggling country, highlighting the disconnect between online representation and reality.
highlights: Served as lead developer and game designer, winning first place at the Print Screen International Design Festival
Designed and implemented game mechanics simulating social media management and tourism promotion
Engineered a hyper-texture GPU-read-back caching engine to enhance game performance
Developed an aesthetic classification model to score the photos taken by the player based on cognitive models

projects.name: SIMPLI
projects.description: Innovative Android UI abstraction layer designed to make smartphones more accessible and user-friendly for the elderly population, winning second place in the 'Appgrading Society Challenge'.
highlights: Spearheaded product design, management, customer research, and academic research for a groundbreaking mobile UI solution
Developed a containerization technology that interpolates app inputs and outputs to create a standardized, elderly-friendly UI experience
Integrated a machine learning hybrid-expert customer support assistant named 'Ezra' to provide continuous user guidance
Project won second place in the 'Appgrading Society Challenge', with the technology and patent subsequently acquired by Google

projects.name: Enterprise Code Quality
projects.description: The code quality analysis framework allows RedHat to identify and address issues in code before they become critical security vulnerabilities.
highlights: Led the development of a comprehensive code quality analysis framework as part of RedHat's Quality 360 system
Architected and managed the development of a company-wide code quality analysis framework
Implemented normalized quality metrics for hundreds of projects across 13,000 employees
Established the groundwork for RedHat's current secure development lifecycle and testing practices

projects.name: Perennial High-School Cyber Program
highlights: Developed and maintained a perennial high-school cyber/cryptography program for the Ministry of Education.
Trained and mentored teachers in the use of computers, programming, and cyber/cryptography.

projects.name: Political Activist Mobilization Telegram Bot
projects.description: Bot that mobilizes political activists to coordinate organic messaging distribution.
highlights: Developed a bot that mobilizes political activists to coordinate organic messaging distribution.
Implemented a system that allows activists to create and share content with a large audience.
Mobilized thousands of activists on Facebook and Messaging apps.

projects.name: Tel Aviv University Rebranding
highlights: Developed a branding strategy for the university, including a new logo, website, and social media presence
Designed and developed a new website for the university, featuring a modern, user-friendly interface
Created a new brand identity for the university, including a new logo and branding guidelines
Developed and managed a social media strategy for the university, including a new social media presence and content strategy

projects.name: 2013 Israeli Legislative Elections
highlights: Produced the websites, social media accounts and digital marketing campaigns for the top 3 political parties in Israel.
Developed and managed the branding strategy for the top 3 political parties in Israel.
Designed the brand identity of the Yesh Atid party on their first election campaign.

projects.name: Goldstar Public Perception Campaign
projects.description: Public perception campaign to rebrand Goldstar as the beer of the people.
highlights: Developed and long-term, multi-stage public perception campaign to rebrand Goldstar as the beer of the people.
Modernized the brand logo and typographical identity.
Produced a public upheaval campaign to promote the brand.

awards.title: Presidential Award for Volunteerism, Public Diplomacy Project
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding contributions to public diplomacy efforts and volunteer work.

awards.title: First Place
awards.summary: Won first place for the game 'Welcome to Stanistan', a satirical PC game about social media management and tourism promotion for a fictional struggling country.

awards.title: Second Place
awards.summary: Won second place for SIMPLI, an innovative Android UI abstraction layer designed to make smartphones more accessible and user-friendly for the elderly population.

awards.title: Moshal Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded a Moshal Scholarship intended to support tenacious and determined students from challenging backgrounds, to obtain high quality, sought-after degrees that lead to successful careers.

awards.title: President's Medal of Exemplary Service, Navy
awards.summary: Honored with the highest recognition for exceptional service and dedication in the Israeli Navy.
